lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The controversial OECD study calculated a measure of farm subsidies called the Producer Subsidy Equivalent, PSE, which allows farm aid to be compared across countries.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. officials said, is to keep the pressure on the EC this year through the export enhancement program and lower value of the dollar, in the hope that a sweeping agriculture agreement is possible in 1988.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: However, the Reagan administration perplexed some trade analysts recently by reacting cooly to a plan by Australian prime minister Bob Hawke calling for a similar approach.
